to.sven.androidrccar.common.service.contract

Interface ILocationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocationService

    public interface ILocationService
    Provides access to the current location.
    Author:
    sven

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getCurrentLocation()
      Returns the current location.
      boolean hasLocationChanged()
      Has the location changed since last call of getCurrentLocation()
      void startListen()
      Requests location updates.
      void stopListen()
      Stops listen for location updates.

    • Method Detail

      • startListen

        void startListen()
        Requests location updates.

      • stopListen

        void stopListen()
        Stops listen for location updates.

      • hasLocationChanged

        boolean hasLocationChanged()
        Has the location changed since last call of getCurrentLocation()
        Returns:
        True, if location has changed

      • getCurrentLocation

        Location getCurrentLocation()
        Returns the current location. Resets hasLocationChanged() to false. It can be null, if no location is available yet.
        Returns:
        Current Location.
